title: Suzume no Tojimari
plot: Suzume no Tojimari: Directed by Makoto Shinkai. With Nanoka Hara, Hokuto Matsumura, Eri Fukatsu, Shôta Sometani. A modern action adventure road story where a 17-year-old girl named Suzume helps a mysterious young man close doors from the other side that are releasing disasters all over in Japan.
